public class MessageHelper
extends DataHelper

General utilities for helping with messages.

numOverheadBytes

public static final int numOverheadBytes(Publishable publishable)
Get the number of bytes needed to serialize this publishable beyond the publishable's data itself.

The amount of overhead is the space for a boolean and the publishable's class name string.
